front.title: MP-BGP Extension and the Procedures for IPv4/IPv6 Mapping Advertisement

abstract.t: This document defines MP-BGP extension and the procedures for IPv4 service delivery in multi-domain IPv6-only underlay networks. It defines a new BGP path attribute known as the "4map6" to be used in conjunction with the existing AFI/SAFI for IPv4 and IPv6. This attribute with associate an IPv4/IPv6 address mapping rule that will allow IPv4 traffic to cross IPv6-only domains. The behavior of each type of network (IPv4 and IPv6) also illustrated.
